jobDescription: Meltwater was founded in 2001 in Oslo, Norway, before moving the company headquarters to San Francisco in 2006. The company has 57 offices and 1,800 employees, with a local presence in every continent.  The company built its reputation by becoming the world leader in electronic media monitoring, supplying clients with the ability to track and analyze their global press coverage and to better leverage that information.  Building on the experience from growing its Meltwater News business globally in 8 short years, the Meltwater began moving into the exciting Software as a Service (SaaS) space in 2009 as it expanded its product offerings to include solutions in social media marketing and PR outreach.
